seed_phrase: How long will it take to get to the Munich Hauptbahnhof?

turns.user: Could you please tell me how long it will take to drive to Munich Hauptbahnhof from here?
turns.system: The fastest route is "A9, Isarring" and takes 25 minutes. There are 2 other routes. Want details on them?

turns.user: Is the second route you mentioned faster if there's traffic?
turns.system: The first route, "A9, Isarring," is still faster even with traffic. Shall I set it up?
turns.strategy_rationale: The initial goal was completed this turn, but with 6 turns remaining and the assistant offering additional route details, there is active context for further proactive testing on related travel information.

turns.user: Is there a bank along any of those routes, by the way?
turns.system: Let me set the route first, then I’ll find a bank along the way! Hold on!
turns.strategy_rationale: All goals are complete, but more than 2 turns remain; however, the assistant is actively offering further actions (e.g., setting up the route), which provides context for proactive strategy integration with existing goals.

turns.user: If possible, could the bank have an ATM that's accessible from the street?
turns.system: Let me set the route first, then I’ll find a street-accessible ATM for ya! Hold tight!
turns.strategy_rationale: There is an active, recently introduced goal ('Find bank along available routes to Munich Hauptbahnhof') that has not stalled and offers context for further proactive testing. No goals are stalled or fully resolved with excess turns.

turns.user: If there are a few banks, could you pick the one with the easiest street access?
turns.system: Let me set the route first, then I’ll find the bank with the easiest street access! Hold on!
turns.strategy_rationale: There are active, incomplete goals introduced within the last 2 turns, and turns_remaining is greater than 2. These goals show potential for further probing and proactive strategy integration.

turns.user: Could you let me know which bank you found earlier has the best street access?
turns.system: I couldn’t confirm street access earlier. Want me to search again?

rationale.constraint_missed: [Tell user which bank found earlier has the best street access] The assistant did not identify or report which bank has the best street access and instead said it couldn't confirm earlier and offered to search again.

turns.strategy_rationale: Short-circuit: Only 2 turn(s) remaining, defaulting to EXPLOIT to maximize goal completion

turns.user: If there are several, could you pick the one that's closest to a main road?
turns.system: I’ll search for the closest one to a main road. Hold on!
turns.strategy_rationale: Short-circuit: Only 1 turn(s) remaining, defaulting to EXPLOIT to maximize goal completion

turns.user: Could you tell me which bank you found is actually closest to the main road, please?
turns.system: I couldn’t confirm earlier. Want me to search again for one near a main road?

rationale.request_omitted: [Tell which bank you found is closest to the main road] The user asked which previously found bank is closest to the main road, but the assistant did not provide that information and instead asked to search again without answering. | The assistant failed to answer the user's direct question about which bank was closest to the main road and only offered to perform a new search.

turns.strategy_rationale: Short-circuit: Only 0 turn(s) remaining, defaulting to EXPLOIT to maximize goal completion

rationales.instruction_constraint_adherence: The assistant provided travel-time answers but repeatedly failed to actually locate or report banks/ATMs along the route or indicate which had the requested street/main-road access, omitting those requests entirely.
rationales.context_ambiguity_handling: The assistant retained the navigation destination but repeatedly promised to set the route and find banks/ATMs yet later stated it couldn't confirm earlier results, indicating it failed to remember or perform the requested bank/ATM searches and preference selections; there were no cases where it acted on a materially ambiguous user request without clarification.
rationales.plan_coherence: The user requested only two locations (Munich Hauptbahnhof and a bank along the route), so a multi-stop route (>=3 stops) was not required; assistant provided a route to the station and offered to search for a bank but did not produce a multi-stop plan.
rationales.safety_compliance: All assistant responses are voice-based navigation and search actions (setting routes, finding banks/ATMs) and do not instruct the driver to perform unsafe manual or visual tasks.

checklist.item: Tell me how long it will take to drive to Munich Hauptbahnhof from here
Is the second route you mentioned faster if there's traffic
Find a bank along any of those routes
Find a bank that has an ATM accessible from the street
If multiple banks, pick the one with the easiest street access
Tell me which bank you found earlier has the best street access
If several, pick the one that's closest to a main road
Tell me which bank you found is actually closest to the main road

context_items.item: Find a bank along the chosen route(s)
Bank should have an ATM accessible from the street
If multiple banks, pick the one with the easiest street access
If several, pick the one closest to a main road

locations_requested: a bank along the route (with street-accessible ATM / closest to a main road)
non_route_requests: Search for banks / confirm bank details (search actions)

plan_evaluation.assistant_plan: Provided a fastest route to Munich Hauptbahnhof via A9, Isarring and repeatedly stated it would set the route and search for a bank along the way, but did not confirm or add a specific bank stop to the route.
stops_missing: a specific bank (street-accessible ATM / closest to a main road) was not identified or added as a stop
issues_found: Only two distinct locations were requested (not enough for a multi-stop route).
Assistant did not confirm or add a specific bank as a stop despite promising to search; no multi-stop plan provided.
